creditline: Gift of George L. Small, Class of 1943
inscribed:
in graphite, upper right: Master's Lodge Jesus Coll. | Cambridge
in ink, upper right: The button unusual
in graphite, center right: broad black Bishops [crossed out] | WRist band 
in ink, right: Mr Pomeroy | Mr Vesey | & Mr McMillan-- | The Revd Mr Harvey Goodwin | Dr Latham of St Johns | Dr Whewell of Trinity | and others, were | exceedingly kind, in showing | me any thing which | might assist me in | my picture of the Martyrs. | + The portrait of Ridley at Cambridge is | very bad & not true [underlined]. The Bishop of | London's Holbein of him is before it | in all respects. + in Pembroke Coll.
in graphite, lower left: at Fulham

titles.title: Album containing 99 original drawings and 87 architecture, portrait, and costume studies of a documentary nature for the paintings Latimer Preaching at Paul's Cross and The Martyrdom of Ridley and Latimer.
